p: The antidiabetic activity of the plant was tested on healthy human subjects. The healthy volunteers received, in a random order, the control stew meal/control wheat bread and the test stew meals/wheat bread containing cissus flours. Compared with the controls, cissus meals elicited significant reductions in plasma glucose and insulin levels at various postprandial time points, possibly due to starch and water-soluble non-starch polysaccharides [ 61].
